parameters.name: CheckType
parameters.description:
The data verification method. Valid values:

*   **1**: full data verification.
*   **2**: incremental data verification.

parameters.name: DbName
parameters.description: The name of the database to which the table that contains inconsistent data belongs.

parameters.name: DtsJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the data migration or data synchronization task. You can call the [DescribeDtsJobs](~~209702~~) operation to query the ID of the task.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number of the page to return. The value must be an integer greater than 0. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: TbName
parameters.description: The name of the table that contains inconsistent data exists.
